attributes.additional_details: There are far too many foreign nationals in this country disrespecting our laws and community and taking part in criminal activity. Many of these people have been convicted of criminal offences and are now taking up space in our already overcrowded prison system. Any foreign nationals convicted of any crime should be immediately deported. This would both make the UK a safer place and free up resources in our prison system.
attributes.background: Any non-British national convicted of a crime in the UK should be immediately deported and refused any further access to the country.

rejection.details:
Immediately deport foreign nationals who break the law
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732628
